com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.utils

Class SCJsonBeanUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.utils.SCJsonBeanUtils

  • public final class SCJsonBeanUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utilities to convert a json string to a java bean and vice versa
    Conversion Rules:
    • Only Java Beans can be converted/created using the utilities provided in this class
    • All Java primitives, Dates, Strings are treated as simple JSON attributes
    • Date attributes in json have to be in the ISO Date Time format. (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ)
    • All other Beans are converted to JSON objects
    • Arrays and lists are converted to an JSON array of objects
    • Names of attributes and elements in the JSON remain the same as in the Java Bean

    SCXmlBeanUtils provides utilities required for converting a xml to a java bean and vice versa. statikonda SCXmlBeanUtils

                                       java.lang.Class beanClass)
        Converts a json string into a java bean. json The json string to be converted into a java bean beanClass The type of bean which needs to be created The newly created bean instance, or null in case of errors #getBean(String, Class, HashMap) for more details

      • getBean

        public static java.lang.Object getBean(java.lang.String json,
                                       java.lang.Class beanClass,
                                       java.util.HashMap beanClassInfoMap)
        Converts a json string into a java bean.
        Example Java Bean definitions: 
         public class Order {
        private Address billTo = null;
        private Address shipTo = null;
        private String orderNo = null;
        private Date orderDate = null;
        ... public getters and setters ...
 }
 
        
 public class Address {
        private String addressLine1 = null;
        private String state = null;
        private String city = null;
        private String zip = null;
        ... public getters and setters ...
 }
        Code Usage: 
         String orderStr = 
                "{
                'billTo':{'addressLine1':'TestAdressLine1','city':'TestCity','state':'TestState','zip':1234},
                'orderDate':'2008-06-05T22:46:03-0400',
                'orderNo':'TestOrder',
                'shipTo':{'addressLine1':'Adress1','city':'city','state':'state','zip':1234}
                }";
 Order order = (Order) SCJsonBeanUtils.getBean(orderStr, Order.class);
        json The json string to be converted into a java bean beanClass The type of bean which needs to be created beanClassInfoMap A hashmap of name to class entries used to determine the runtime java bean class of a child object, which exists within the passed json string The newly created bean instance, or null in case of errors

      • getBeanCollection

        public static java.util.Collection getBeanCollection(java.lang.String json,
                                                     java.lang.Class beanClass)
        Converts a json array into a collection of java bean objects. json The json string (Array) to be converted into collection of java beans beanClass The type of bean which needs to be created as entries in the collection The newly created collection of bean instances, or null in case of errors
